snippet: President Obama and Mitt Romney will square off on Tuesday at Hofstra University in Hempstead, N.Y., at 9 p.m. Eastern time in the second of three presidential debates.
abstract: President Obama and Mitt Romney will square off on Tuesday at Hofstra University in Hempstead, N.Y., at 9 p.m. Eastern time in the second of three presidential debates.

headline.main: Coming Later Today: Coverage of the Second Presidential Debate
